channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Free condoms, lube and sex ed materials in stock for all ages at CA libraries, thanks to Planned Parenthood
item.description: The Sacramento Public Library system adding condoms, lube and other sex resources in a dozen of its libraries in partnership with Planned Parenthood.

item.title: Do It for Bill
item.description: In honor of Buckley’s centenary, could you help us get to $100,000?

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Three Massive Religious Liberty Cases Before SCOTUS
item.description: Each of these cases seeks to return our nation to the original intent of religious liberty in our U.S. Constitution.

item.title: Privatize the Postal Service
item.description: It doesn’t mean obliteration. It means innovation, allowing new ideas to enter the chat — preferably ones not written on parchment or powered by oxen.

item.title: Why Is Trump’s DOJ Hiding An FBI Informant’s Deposition On The Oklahoma Bombing?
item.description: An attorney in Utah is working to unearth the truth through his ongoing lawsuit for surveillance footage of the Oklahoma City bombing.

item.title: Libraries Take a Hit in the Latest White House Order
item.description: A department supporting literacy, archive digitization, and conservation is set to sink into the briny deep.

item.title: This Supreme Court Is Woefully Weak On The Second Amendment
item.description: When firearms are involved, originalism is ignored and basic principles of statutory interpretation are overlooked.

item.title: Conservatives Aren’t ‘Christian Nationalists,’ They’re Just Homesick For America
item.description: Homesickness is what Americans have been feeling. It’s far from the corporate media’s misuse of the term 'Christian nationalism.'

item.title: The Five Biggest Challenges Facing America
item.description: These are the big-picture questions that should worry us most.

item.title: Trump targets more law firms

item.title: Trump moves to modernize the Defense Department procurement process
item.description: President Trump is aiming to modernize the Department of Defense by improving the procurement process and weapons sales to U.S. allies.
